title: The Collectible Golf Balls Directory
subtitle: Folio I: Gutta-Percha Golf Balls 1845–1903

author.name: Kevin W. McGimpsey
author.bio: Kevin W. McGimpsey is the British Golf Collectors Society's Murdoch Medal winner of 2004 for his seminal book, 'The Story of the Golf Ball'. A former Captain in the Parachute Regiment, Kevin traded his red beret for a career in antique and collectible golfing memorabilia, an area in which he has firmly established himself as an internationally renowned expert.

designer: Nick Sample, Freelance Creative Graphic Designer, Appleton, England

chapters.title: Welcome
chapters.content: Welcome to the definitive reference work on gutta-percha golf balls. This directory catalogs 551 antique golf balls from the historic gutta-percha era (1845–1903), featuring detailed specifications, valuations, patents, and auction histories.

chapters.title: Golfers and Manufacturers from the Gutta-Percha Era
